law.catch_line: A license holder may issue as a prize or award to the patron of licensed bingo:...

section.section: Except as provided under paragraphs (2) and (3) of this subsection, a license holder may not issue for one game a prize or award with a value exceeding $100.
A holder of a Class NG beach license may issue for one game a prize with a value exceeding $100.

A license holder may issue once each day:
a grand prize not exceeding $1,500; and
a grand prize not exceeding $3,000 in retail value.
